results.title: 100th Anniversary Special (2014) #1
results.description: A REMARKABLE ARTIFACT FROM THE FUTURE OF MARVEL COMICS! It's 2061 and the world of the Fantastic Four has turned upside-down, complete with the granddaughter of Doom...and the Richards-Banner twins

results.title: 100th Anniversary Special (2014) #1
results.description: Just in time for the release of their SEVENTH epic motion picture, the Guardians of the Galaxy are celebrating their 100th Anniversary...by taking on the THE SILVER GALACTUS!

results.title: 100th Anniversary Special (2014) #1
results.description: CELEBRATE 100 YEARS OF EARTH'S MIGHTIEST HEROES – THE AVENGERS! Following the failed Badoon invasion of Earth and America's disappearance into the Negative Zone, how will the Avengers of 2061 cope?!

results.title: 100th Anniversary Special (2014) #1
results.description: - Have the X-Men of 2061 achieved Xavier's dream of mutants and humans living in harmony? Or will there always be a need for the X-Men?

results.title: 100th Anniversary Special (2014) #1
results.description: It's 100 years after the wall-crawler's creation, but when the Kingpin has taken Spider-Man's ultra-powerful techno-symbiote suit, Spider-Man will need to prove once again why he is the world's greatest super hero.

results.title: 15 Love (2011) #1
results.description: Teenage tennis action as only Marvel can deliver! Tennis is Mill Collins whole life...but as the lowest ranking student at the Wayde Tennis Academy, she's about to lose her scholarship, and any chance at reaching her dream. What will she do next?

results.title: 15 Love (2011) #2
results.description: Millie's new coach, Walt, has her working day and night, training to get her off the bottom of the academy's ranking.Â  But when a photographer takes an interest in Mill, a whole new wrinkle is added into her life.

results.title: 15 Love (2011) #3
results.description: Between a possible modeling deal and the boy she's interested in, is it any wonder Mill's trainer thinks she's not focused? But if she wants to prove herself she needs to get her head in the game fast and turn things around!

results.title: 15-Love GN-TPB (Graphic Novel)
results.description: Teenage tennis action as only Mighty Marvel can deliver! Tennis is Mill Collins' whole life. But as the lowest-ranking student at the Wayde?Tennis Academy, she's about to lose her scholarship - and any chance at reaching her dream. Her coach has given up on her, her aunt thinks she doesn't try, and the only one who believes in her is a washed-up drunk. How wrong can things possibly go before Mill catches a break? Collecting 15-LOVE #1-3.
The start of a whole new Marvel Universe begins here! It's the Marvel Universe in the year 1602.

Matthew Murdoch continues to make his way across Europe to get the mysterious Templar treasure that Dr. Strange thinks will give him the key to the mysterious weather changes. But can he get to it before Otto Von Doom?  And what does the first American-born child, Virginia Dare, have to do with it all? 32 PGS./MARVEL PSR...$3.50
With the country in turmoil, Dr. Strange learns Virginia Dare's dark secret, Peter Parquargh is captured by the X-Men, and Fury is placed in an impossible position! 32 PGS./MARVEL PSR...$3.50

Sir Nicholas Fury leads an army against Carlos Javier's Witchbreed!  And we learn the true history of the Four from the Fantastik.
32 PGS./MARVEL PSR...$3.50

Cardstock cover by SCOTT MCKOWEN
Doctor Strange goes to the moon, while our heroes take on Doom and his Vulture squadron!
32 PGS./MARVEL PSR...$3.50

Secrets are revealed and coffins are closed as two of our 17th-century Marvel heroes lose their lives in the penultimate chapter to this major, best-selling limited series event!
32 PGS./MARVEL PSR...$3.50
CLIMATIC last issue! Secrets revealed! Mysteries explained! A mighty sacrifice! Worlds live! Worlds die! Heroes make choices! And so do villains...

results.title: 1602 Witch Hunter Angela (2015) #1
results.description: In the altered realms of BATTLEWORLD, Angela and Sera are WITCH HUNTERS, the scourges of King James' England, 1602. In a land beset by magic and monstrosity, they seek a new and seductive evil-not witchbreed, but deal-making FAUSTIANS, who bargain with ancient creatures for unnatural power! Moral ambiguity? Fancy allusions? Marguerite making the most of that English degree? tl;dr - try 1602 WITCH HUNTER ANGELA #1!

results.title: 1602 Witch Hunter Angela (2015) #1 (Christopher Gwengela Variant)
results.description: - In the altered realms of BATTLEWORLD, Angela and Sera are WITCH HUNTERS, the scourges of King James' England, 1602. - In a land beset by magic and monstrosity, they seek a new and seductive evil-not witchbreed, but deal-making FAUSTIANS, who bargain with ancient creatures for unnatural power! - Moral ambiguity? Fancy allusions? Marguerite making the most of that English degree? - tl;dr - try 1602 WITCH HUNTER ANGELA #1

results.title: 1602 Witch Hunter Angela (2015) #1 (Isanove Variant)
results.description: - In the altered realms of BATTLEWORLD, Angela and Sera are WITCH HUNTERS, the scourges of King James' England, 1602. - In a land beset by magic and monstrosity, they seek a new and seductive evil-not witchbreed, but deal-making FAUSTIANS, who bargain with ancient creatures for unnatural power! - Moral ambiguity? Fancy allusions? Marguerite making the most of that English degree? - tl;dr - try 1602 WITCH HUNTER ANGELA #1!

results.title: 1602 Witch Hunter Angela (2015) #2
results.description:
"IN WHICH WICKED SOMETHINGS THIS WAY COME"
The hunt is on! The Faustians have made their deal with the Devil -- er, Enchantress -- but Angela isn't going to take that lying down, is she? No, not by her psychic ribbons and very, very pointy weapons, no, she is not. Out into the wilds of the countryside, Angela and Sera collide with a wandering caravan of ne'er-do-well performers. (Hint: their name starts with a "G" and ends with an "Y" and has an "Uardians of the Galax" in the middle.) Pagan rites, dubious ethics, a deadly curse, and Kieron and Irene Koh being up to no good - who can resist the lure of the Faustians?

results.title: 1602 Witch Hunter Angela (2015) #2 (Koh Variant)
results.description:
"IN WHICH WICKED SOMETHINGS THIS WAY COME"
- The hunt is on! The Faustians have made their deal with the Devil -- er, Enchantress -- but Angela isn't going to take that lying down, is she? No, not by her psychic ribbons and very, very pointy weapons, no, she is not.
- Out into the wilds of the countryside, Angela and Sera collide with a wandering caravan of ne'er-do-well performers. (Hint: their name starts with a "G" and ends with an "Y" and has an "Uardians of the Galax" in the middle.)
- Pagan rites, dubious ethics, a deadly curse, and Kieron and Irene Koh being up to no good - who can resist the lure of the Faustians?

results.title: 1602 Witch Hunter Angela (2015) #3
results.description: "IN WHICH HEARTS REND AND HEADS ROLL" Enchantress's prophecy strangles Angela and Sera from all sides when they are forced to ride hell (and a few other realms, too) for leather to the distant coast. In a haunted castle, a tormented witchbreed girl named Anna Maria - a.k.a. the 1602 Rogue - makes a deadly deal - with a shocking price! Kieron and Frazer Irving bring to life the first tale Angela tells that is her very own - as the forces of Faerie close in!

results.title: 1602 Witch Hunter Angela (2015) #3 (Irving Variant)
results.description:
"IN WHICH HEARTS REND AND HEADS ROLL"
- Enchantress's prophecy strangles Angela and Sera from all sides when
they are forced to ride hell (and a few other realms, too) for leather to
the distant coast.
- In a haunted castle, a tormented witchbreed girl named Anna Maria -
a.k.a. the 1602 Rogue - makes a deadly deal - with a shocking price!
- Kieron and Frazer Irving bring to life the first tale Angela tells that
is her very own - as the forces of Faerie close in!

results.title: 1602 Witch Hunter Angela (2015) #4
results.description:
• Spurred by revenge, Angela races to meet Enchantress's endgame as the gates of Faerie are wrenched open!
• The dead walk and speak (and tell terrible jokes), and Kieron and Kody Chamberlain lead the revels, as Angela embarks on the Wild Hunt for Serah's soul!

SHERIFF STEVE ROGERS faces corruption and fear in the boom town of TIMELY. The only thing ANTHONY STARK seems capable of is pulling a cork, so can he pull Rogers' fat from the fire? But...a stranger comes to town that will change Timely forever...for anyone left standing, that is.

results.title: 1872 (2015) #1 (Shaner Variant)
results.description: REAL HEROES DIE WITH THEIR BOOTS ON - SHERIFF STEVE ROGERS faces corruption and fear in the boom town of TIMELY. - The only thing ANTHONY STARK seems capable of is pulling a cork, so can he pull Rogers' fat from the fire? - But...a stranger comes to town that will change Timely forever...for anyone left standing, that is.

results.title: 1872 (2015) #1 (Young Variant)
results.description: REAL HEROES DIE WITH THEIR BOOTS ON - SHERIFF STEVE ROGERS faces corruption and fear in the boom town of TIMELY. - The only thing ANTHONY STARK seems capable of is pulling a cork, so can he pull Rogers' fat from the fire? - But...a stranger comes to town that will change Timely forever...for anyone left standing, that is.
DEAD MAN'S HAND! BULLSEYE! ELEKTRA! GRIZZLY! DOC OCK! 'NUFF SAID, PARTNER!
Fisk and his men are triumphant-but have they let their guard down? Just what concoction is timid Dr. Banner cooking up in his apothecary? You cannot miss the shocking last page as a hero is reborn.

results.title: 1872 (2015) #3 (Francavilla Variant)
results.description:
• Fisk and his men are triumphant-but have they let their guard down?
• Just what concoction is timid Dr. Banner cooking up in his apothecary?  
• You cannot miss the shocking last page as a hero is reborn.
IT'S HIGH NOON IN TIMELY! Will justice stand tall, or die in the street? Timid Dr. Banner comes out of his shell. Red Wolf's fate is finally revealed...

results.title: 2099 Unlimited (1993) #1
results.description: Two riveting stories form Marvel’s 2099 Universe! Spider-Man 2099 must combat a murderer with a dangerous obsession for evolution.  And this villain will do anything to adapt and conquer! Plus, meet John Eisenhart, entertainment lawyer turned gamma-irradiated beast. Discover the strange origin of Hulk 2099!

results.title: 2099 Unlimited (1993) #2
results.description: What is the R-Gang of 2099, and what will they do to cause mischief? Plus, the return of Hulk 2099! Will John Eisenhart be able to escape his worst enemy yet - society at large?

results.title: 2099 Unlimited (1993) #3
results.description: Hulk 2099 must challenge a megalomaniacal villain by the name of Water God. Will Hulk be able to save refugees along the California border? Plus, Spider-Man 2099 must keep his identity safe from co-worker Anna Coye, but will Miguel O’ Hara’s secret lead to Anna’s demise?

Comics' first family face their most personal and unpredictable crisis yet in this debut of their new edgy MARVEL KNIGHTS ongoing series. Writer Roberto Aguirre-Sacasa and rising-superstar artist Steve McNiven pit the Fantastic Four against a challenge the likes of which they've never faced, and to overcome it they'll need to call on the same humor, determination and family bonds that have delivered them from danger time and time again.
This is the FF ... the 4 ... like you've never seen them before!
32 PGS.(each)/MARVEL PSR...$2.99

"THE STUFF OF DREAMS" 1 (OF 3) Something very, very strange is happening to New York's First Family of Super Heroes. Their deepest fears and doubts are spreading from their dreams - their unconscious minds-to the waking world. What's real and what's not?

"THE STUFF OF DREAMS" PART 2 (OF 3) With a diseased Psycho-Man loose somewhere in the city, the very fabric of New York's reality is unraveling at a frightening rate. While Susan hunts their old foe, the rest of the Fantastic Four try to stem the tide of

"THE STUFF OF DREAMS" PART 3 (OF 3)
Every dream must come to an end-even the fear-induced nightmares that Psycho-Man is spreading across Manhattan!  It's the climax to the first year of Marvel Knights 4 and the final showdown between the FF and their reality-warping foe.  Hold onto your seats - especially you slight Marvelites - that wind blowing is a radical shift in the status quo of Marvel Comics' First Family of super heroes and adventurers!

"EYES WITHOUT A FACE" PART 1 (OF 2)
It's good news all around-not just for the FF, who have reclaimed their status as New York's premiere super hero team-but for their friend and ally Alicia Masters. After a lifetime of darkness, the blind sculptress's eyesight has been restored by her father Philip Masters-the seemingly reformed villain Puppet Master-but at what cost? Either all is as it seems...or darker forces are at work.

"Eyes Without a Face"
The truth about the Puppet-Master's "rehabilitation" finally comes to light, but with Reed, Johnny, and Ben off-planet on an intergalactic mission of mercy, only the villain's stepdaughter Alicia can possibly save Sue from his horrific machinations. But now that her sight's been restored...will Alicia want to? Part 2 (of 3).

"DIVINE TIME" Prologue [1 OF 4]
In New York, it's springtime-and business as usual for the FF, as they celebrate Franklin's team making it to the Little League playoffs-but around the globe...the very fabric of time is unraveling. Minutes are vanishing from days and objects from the past are materializing in the present. When these chronal anomalies start multiplying like a virus, Reed, Sue, Ben, and Johnny decide to slip into the timestream to investigate. For seasoned adventurers like the FF, it should be a walk in the park, right?
Guess again.

"DIVINE TIME"
They have marched across time, building their empires, subjugating entire civilizations and peoples. Khan. Alexander. Attila. Napoleon. Hitler. Determined to take his rightful place alongside them in the pages of history, Ramades, son of Rama-Tut, Divine Ruler of Egypt, has navigated oceans of time and space to claim the New World-the modern world - for himself. With the Fantastic Four lost in time - and desperately trying to get back to the present to stop Ramades--the mad conqueror's tide of destruction begins! Part 2 (of 4).
32 PGS./Marvel PSR ...$2.99

"DIVINE TIME"
In the far past, in a reality that shouldn't exist, the fight for the future rages on! Branded as outlaws and trapped in a pyramid of horrors-with no modern technology at their disposal-how will Reed, Sue, and Ben escape Ancient Egypt to stop the mad tyrant Ramades in the present? And where exactly is Johnny? Cut off from his teammates, can it be that his only hope for survival is...DOOM?
Part 3 (of 4)
32 PGS./Marvel PSR ...$2.99

"DIVINE TIME"
It's a race against time-and across time-as the beleaguered members of the Fantastic Four make one last-ditch effort to overthrow the mad despot Ramades, who has turned the entire planet Earth into his personal battlefield. With so many lives in the balance-and so many lives already sacrificed-this is one battle the FF dare not lose! Part 4 (of 4).
32 PGS./Marvel PSR ...$2.99

"Inhumane" Part 1 (of 2)
The Inhumans live by their own rites and rituals, their own laws and governances. But when two Inhuman children seek asylum with the Fantastic Four, battle lines are drawn and an inter-species war threatens to erupt! Old alliances are threatened and friends stand now as enemies!
32 PGS./T+ Suggested for Teens and Up ...$2.99

Comics' first family face their most personal and unpredictable crisis yet in this debut of their new edgy MARVEL KNIGHTS ongoing series. Writer Roberto Aguirre-Sacasa and rising-superstar artist Steve McNiven pit the Fantastic Four against a challenge the likes of which they've never faced, and to overcome it they'll need to call on the same humor, determination and family bonds that have delivered them from danger time and time again.
This is the FF ... the 4 ... like you've never seen them before!
32 PGS.(each)/MARVEL PSR...$2.99

INHUMANE
The conflict between the Family Fantastic and the Inhumans heats up with Black Bolt and Medusa's arrival on Earth. Sue is determined to keep the two Inhuman runaways safe no matter the cost, but with the rest of the FF wondering if they should even be involved in this dispute, what possible hope do she and the alien children have? Part 2 [of 2]
32 PGS./T+ SUGGESTED FOR TEENS AND UP ...$2.99

"DESPERATE HOUSEWIFE"
Stand-alone issue! Susan and Reed Richards are among comicdom's happiest, most stable couples. So why, then, does Reed perpetually forget their anniversary?
When it happens yet again, it's up to Sue's best girlfriends - Alicia, Crystal, and the Sensational She-Hulk - to cheer her up with a night out on the town... Marvel style! While dishing about their former crushes, Sue reveals an untold episode from her past involving... the Black Panther?!
32 PGS./T+ SUGGESTED FOR TEENS AND UP ...$2.99

"THE YANCY STREET GOLEM"

On Yancy Street, on the Lower East Side of Manhattan, someone--or something--is putting the hurt on the neighborhood's tough guys. Someone or something very large and very brutal, which is leaving a trail of twisted, broken bodies in its wake. Ben Urich, Jessica Jones, and the FF's ever-loving blue-eyed Thing are on the case, but what exactly is the nature of the threat they're facing?


32 PGS./T+ SUGGESTED FOR TEENS AND UP ...$2.99

One of the Marvel U's most powerful entities--the reality-bending, green-skinned alien Imposssible Man--pops up to cause havoc in this offbeat tale that blurs the line between fact and fiction, men and myth!
32 PGS./T+ SUGGESTED FOR TEENS AND UP ...$2.99

The reality-shredding insanity begun last issue with the Impossible Man's return to Earth amps up with the arrival of the Fantastic Four's evil twins, sudden growth spurts for Franklin and Valeria, and a...Deus Ex Machina appearance in the mighty FF tradition?! Will the FF survive this meta-adventure? Probably--but will Marvel Comics?
32 PGS./T+ SUGGESTED FOR TEENS AND UP ...$2.99

THE RESSURECTION OF NICHOLAS SCRATCH Part 1 [of 3]
The is an order to everything. A balance to the world and the nether-realms beneath the world. And now that balance is being tipped, as dark forces gather like a storm. The occult mutants known as Salem's Seven are once more banding together. But this time, it's to bring their father, the nefarious Nicholas Scratch, back to life. If they should somehow succeed...pray for the Fantastic Four's souls!

Sacrifices have been made, dark forces are gathering like storm clouds over Whisper Hill-the abandoned home of the deceased witch Agatha Harkness-and the Fantastic Four's powers are short-circuiting. With the malevolent Salem Seven about to open a portal to the land of the dead, can the FF afford to stay away?
32 PGS./T+ SUGGESTED FOR TEENS AND UP...$2.99

"THE RESURRECTION OF NICHOLAS SCRATCH" Part 3 (of 3)
Of all the universe's realms, those of magic and the occult are where the Fantastic Four are most at the mercy of their foes. Armed with a book of magic only Franklin can read, the powerless FF have one final chance to defeat the Salem Seven, the monstrous Nicholas Scratch, and the seemingly returned witch Agatha Harkness. But what role will...DIABLO play?


32 PGS./T+ SUGGESTED FOR TEENS AND UP ...$2.99

PRIVATE LIVES/PUBLIC FACES Part 1 [of 1]
During any given week, the crises faced by New York's first family of super heroes can range from the profoundly cosmic to the deeply personal. Today, in this stand-alone issue, an employee from Fantastic Enterprises will come to Susan Richards for help, claiming that her son is being abused. And Reed Richards will be asked to keep a promise he made to a dying man months ago. Great jumping on point!
32 PGS./T+ SUGGESTED FOR TEENS AND UP ...$2.99
Mr. Fantastic is one of the Illuminati of heroes who has sent Bruce Banner to Planet Hulk. But what mess from this banishment will the Fantastic Four have to clean up?

Metal-faced despots, intergalactic deities, and subterranean savages couldn't destroy the FF, but will Marvel's first family be torn apart by the most human threat it's ever faced?
Plus: A classic knockdown, drag-'em-out brawl between The Thing and The Human Torch!
